pkgmetadata.longdescription: Distributions and Gradients // Provides density, distribution function, quantile function and random generation for the split normal and split-t distributions, and computes their mean, variance, skewness and kurtosis for the two distributions (Li, F, Villani, M. and Kohn, R. (2010) doi:10.1016/j.jspi.2010.04.031).
